channel.title: [PI] Fishing, Smith & Fletching Messed Up :: Final Jugdment Soruce
channel.description:
Well as the title says, Fishing, Smithing and fletching are not working on my server, can anyone help me? Problems to Fix: -Smithing when you try to smelt on the furnance (any bar) , and when you try to smith something on an anvil the clinet crashes, but when you log in, you actually got the xp/lvl up on smithing. What I want to fix is the crashing when Smelting/Smithing.
-Fletching when you try to cut logs with knife, string, same as Smithing, client crashes, and you recive xp/lvl up.
-Fishing I try to fix (with my fishing net on inventory) but I don't start fishing... I think im missing the fish gfx or I really don't know.
I'll post anything you need , just tell me what to do.
I'll be very Thankful if anyone helps me 8)
-Heinz
Another Thing :P How do I make the Kalphite Lair Multi?, It does have the 'Multi zone sign' but you 2 can't attack. Any Ideas 8)

item.title: [PI] Fishing, Smith & Fletching Messed Up :: Final Jugdment Soruce
item.dc:creator: @deathbysniper97 deathbysniper97
item.description:
@deathbysniper97 wrote:

Hey,
I had the same problem with fishing on my server. I figured it all out now.
The cause of this problem is that in PI, fishing spots are made as NPC’s, So when you net/harpoon/cage it, it trys to attack you.
the fix is simple, just one line of code!

Go into Client.java on your server side, and search for this:

Right above that, add this code:

Then you’re done! Go test it out!

I hope this helps!

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Fishing, Smith & Fletching Messed Up :: Final Jugdment Soruce
item.dc:creator: @Soviet Soviet
item.description:
@Soviet wrote:

I InDrEk I:

What does the serverś/clients cmd prints when it crashes?

Ok, I just checked, I don’t close the Client. Connection Lost, thats the only thing it appears.

EDIT:

Y click on the furnance, select the bar then the screen goes, Loading Please Wait…then Connection Lost.

Well as the title says, Fishing, Smithing and fletching are not working on my server, can anyone help me?
Problems to Fix:
-Smithing when you try to smelt on the furnance (any bar) , and when you try to smith something on an anvil the clinet crashes, but when you log in, you actually got the xp/lvl up on smithing. What I want to fix is the crashing when Smelting/Smithing.

-Fletching when you try to cut logs with knife, string, same as Smithing, client crashes, and you recive xp/lvl up.

-Fishing I try to fix (with my fishing net on inventory) but I don’t start fishing… I think im missing the fish gfx or I really don’t know.

I’ll be very Thankful if anyone helps me 8)
